levels.levelDescription: I know http verbs (at least POST, GET), REST basics, URL routing and how to handle basics http error codes and responses
I understand Request, Response objects, middleware pattern in Express and parametrized routes
I am capable of write handlers for parametrized routes, also I can manipulate middleware, Request and Response objects
I can write generic middleware and integrate Express with another frameworks/libraries
I have a very basic idea of the most common topics (Libraries, Serial Port, comm, hardware components)
I understand the basics and can read and modify existing code.
I can extend new features such as add a new sensor (HW/SW) or new actuator like and engine (HW/SW)
I am able to build all from scratch (select HW components, comm protocols, libraries, project setup, testing...)
I have a very basic idea of the most common topics
I understand the basics and can read and modify existing code.
I am not afraid to use advance tools (levels, filtering)
I am able to explain to others most of the topics, even advance ones.
I know which is the primary use of npm and package.json
I understand semver and the details about package.json structure
I know what is npm link for and how to publish a module in the public registry
I am a npm application contributor or module maintainer
I have a very basic idea of the most common topics (PM2, daemons, SIGINT, etc...)
I understand the basics and can read and modify existing code.
I can develop new solutions that use it.
I am able to explain to others most of the topics, even advance ones.
